          <title>
            <string language="es">Dos progresiones aritméticas sobre elementos geométricos</string>
            <string language="en">Two arithmetic progressions on geometric elements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei arithmetische Reihen auf geometrischen 
Elementen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux progressions arithmétiques sur les 
éléments géométriques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas progressões aritméticas em elementos 
geométricos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due progressioni aritmetiche sugli elementi 
geometrici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο αριθμητικές πρόοδοι στα γεωμετρικά στοιχεία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que muestra los primeros términos de dos progresiones aritméticas a partir de construcciones geométricas</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which shows the first terms of two arithmetic progressions by means of a geometrical representation</string>
          </description>
